data.message: PLEASE don't let this whole album be about politics. He did a few disses on Trump with campaign speech, now this. The end. Does every bar have to be against Trump?

replies.message: I agree. This was more of a message though, supposedly his new album his supposed to be kinda like the eminem show.
Like seriously? I listen to music to get away from real life, now Eminem is spewing this crap now? So disappointing!
Then you have never listened to rap or hell any kind of music. Rap especially has always been political.
If you don't like it, good

Jose Manuel Castrejon I'm not saying it can't be political. I'm saying he's already done this on campaign speech. I'm okay with him rapping about whatever. But it seems desperate for him to keep doing this just because. He didn't go this heavy on Bush. It's just growing old, that's all.

And Adam Ryd lol good comeback man.

You must've not listened to Eminem Show, Encore, or just about any other Eminem album.  I'm glad to have athletes, actors, and musical artist like Eminem stand up for what they believe in.    He basically just said what 75 percent of America is feeling.   Don't like it, move on.
Austin Douglas he didn't go heavy on Bush? Seriously dude where were you around that time? Almost every song had a line about Bush somewhere in it.

David Lee Shepherd II Firstly, Eminem Show and Encore had a few lines about him yes. And I'm cool with that man. I'm not a conservative or a liberal for sure lol. Although I will say it's funny that liberals and conservatives both are ok with free speech until someone says something they disagree with.

Amber Wriker one or two lines is cool. I liked Campaign Speech because it had bars all around. Dissing Trump is cool, I get that and I'm okay with it. All I'm saying is, I EXPECTED MORE VARIETY.
Austin was responding to Angie. That being said, this was apparently freestyle so im guessing its probably much harder to get creatively descriptive on the spot.
David Lee Shepherd II 75% of America? You realize who the president is? Lol Hillary may have gotten what 2 million more votes than trump, but that doesn’t count for 26%.
He specifically addressed your concerns in the video, did you watch until the end?
also not for nothing, worst lines of rhymes hes every spit.
Trump supporters keep calling people snowflakes but they proved themselves to be the biggest ones. 😂😂😂
This is what trump is worry about  his IQ 2017 filled with stupid people in the white  and modern day slavery
yes that was the point.  Duh
